DOC.brief_summary: Test pharmacodynamic efficacy tolerability short-time intra-seasonal updosing
DOC.brief_title: Intraseasonal Short-time Up-dosing With Alutard SQ Grasses
DOC.criteria: history grass pollen induce allergic rhinoconjunctivitis positive skin prick test uncontrolled severe bronchial asthma previous treatment immunotherapy within previous 5 year contraindication specific immunotherapy
